dimensions.description: The dimensions to which each input image will be resized to before processing

bubbleDimensions.description: The dimensions of the overlay bubble area

preProcessors.description: Custom configuration values to use in the template's directory

concatenations.description: The Concatenations parameter is a way to tell OMRChecker which fields need to be joined together before outputting into the csv

singles.description: The remaining fields(in order) whose readings shall be forwarded directly in the output csv
